summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the City Treasurer to reduce all assessments on lots 16, block 2, Whipple's 1st Addition to the City of Seattle, and on lot 1, block 1, Greene's Addition to the City of Seattle, levied for the improvement of Louisa Street, et al, by constructing concrete walks thereon, as provided for by Ordinance No. 13416 creating Local Improvement District No. 1221, and appropriating money therefor.
